Requirement: Device state changes must be reflected in UI within 2 seconds of user action
Application must handle API failures gracefully with user-friendly error messages
UI must adapt responsively to screen sizes from 320px (mobile) to 1440px+ (desktop)
Application must function consistently across Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge browsers
Automation triggers must execute within 30 seconds of scheduled time
System must maintain device state accuracy - displayed states must match actual device states
Application must meet WCAG 2.1 Level AA accessibility standards
All interactive elements must be keyboard accessible with visible focus indicators
Device status must be conveyed through multiple methods (visual, text, ARIA labels)
